attributes.action: Stop hostile architecture against the homeless!
attributes.additional_details:
We believe hostile architecture is extremely offensive to not only the homeless but also the public who find it rude and don't know ways to help the homeless. 
Hostile architecture is an easy issue to solve as if the government are finding it hard to fund then I am sure many people would be happy to donate to fund either adding new outdoor seating or removing the hostile architecture.
attributes.background: Remove any hostile architecture off the streets to allow homeless people to sleep if there is no available homeless shelters

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635037
